NN/IT_Cause: ETL lag or ingestion pipeline failure
Local_Effect: Incorrect turnaround time parameters in published dataset
System_Effect: Turnaround planning tools use outdated assumptions
Ops_Effect: Ground delays and potential ground operations constraint violations
Detection_Method: Automated dataset freshness and consistency checks
Mitigation/Compensation: Rollback to last approved dataset + initiate ERP bulletin to operators/MRO
